name: Wolfback Mountain
description:
You are a sheep herder tasked with herding your flock of sheep. You have to protect them from predators and the like. However, there are no wolves in Wolfback Mountain. The only predator that resides there is yourself. You are a werewolf but you are also a sheep herder. Herd your livestock during the day and hope that you do not harm the in the bowels of the night.

This is the first Game Makers Toolkit Game Jam I've joined with my friend Pei Keong. We hope you'll have a great time with what we made despite how short it is. 

Gameplay and Controls:

Protect your sheep during the day by herding them to safe locations.

Move with WSAD or with the analog stick on your controller. 

Spacebar or (A) to move crates. They will block you in your werewolf form.

Herding sheep to a barn will guarantee protection in the night. 

Have Fun.
